summary: great little syntax file for all you mudders!
name: syntax-highlighting-for-tintinttpp
description:
cool vim syntax file for tt++ / tintin...http://tintin.sourceforge.net/
only the best mud client available to man!

note***this file is in a linux format, it probably won't work straightaway on a windows box...you'll have to go reset the cr / crlf's i believe.

-=Todo=-
Expand keyword selection to include caps...right now #alias / #action and all other keywords are on highlighted if they are in lowercase.
If you have any suggestions please feel free to mail me at 
cheshire.in.darkness ::at:: gmail ::dot:: com

thanks!
install_details:
simply copy this file to /usr/share/vim/vim71/syntax or ~/.vim/syntax
and then execute the following command in vim
:set syntax=tt
